problems.text: Alex walks 1 km on day 1, 1.5 km on day 2, 2 km on day 3, and so on. How far does he walk on day 8?
A classroom has 4 chairs in the first row, 7 in the second, continuing in this pattern. How many in 6 rows?
A student scores 70 on the first test and increases the score by 5 in each following test. What is the score on the 5th test?
A delivery truck drops off 10 bottles, then 12 the next day, 14 the next. How many bottles after 8 days?
